name: Fight the Gnome-pocalypse!
description: In this flowery defense game you will have to fight hordes of damn gnomes with different plants you will unlock as enemies get stronger, but with a twist: if two plants are close to eachother, they become sad and weak. And keeping your plants happy and distant is made even more difficult by the trees that sprout continuosly from the ground. Try to beat all 12 waves and beat the final boss!
